evidence_example.title: Lauterbach TriCore simulator demo
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal Demo developed in collaboration with Lauterbach, it runs under Lauterbach simulation environment and Infineon TriBoard.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Task demo: A minimal EE demo with the TriCore TC275-TE under lauterbach simulation environment and Infineo TriBoard The demo uses the following peripherals:
  • STM Timer;
  • DIO as output for LEDs;
  • DIO as envent input with ESR (External Service Requests) as button [Soldered by hand];
The demo tests the ECC1 kernel type.
